attributes.action: Call an Immediate General Election and Resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the state of the country, the chaos of the NHS,Immigration,Gun and other serious crime on our streets, no  prison places, our Troops in an illegal war, overtaxing of British Citizens we call upon our Prime Minister to resign immediately and call a General Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
